subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Hawks’ Al Horford scored 30 points to lead the Dominican Republic to a victory over South Korea, earning a place in the quarterfinals of the men’s Olympic qualifying tournament.
snippet: The Atlanta Hawks’ Al Horford scored 30 points to lead the Dominican Republic to a victory over South Korea, earning a place in the quarterfinals of the men’s Olympic qualifying tournament.
